wikipedia_page.main: Declan David Glass (born 7 June 2000) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Dundee United. He made his senior debut for Dundee United in October 2017, and has also played on loan for Airdrieonians and Cove Rangers.

response: I have added Declan Glass as he has now made two appearances in the league. Dunarc (talk) 22:40, 13 April 2018 (UTC)
